Package server.data

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CopyOrMoveResult
    A JSON object used to pass the result of a copy/move operation.
    DatabaseManager
    Class for interacting with the database
    DeleteResult
    Encapsulates result of a deletion
    FileManager
    Class for operations on the filedata collection, which stores file metadata.
    NoWarningJSONArray
    Subclass of JSONArray that suppresses the warnings
    NoWarningJSONObject
    Subclass of JSONObject that suppresses the warnings
    RenameResult
    Encapsulation of a result of a rename operation.
    SharedFolderManager
    Class for operations on shared folders.
    UniqueIDGenerator
    Generates unique IDs for shared folders and voting.
    UserManager
    Class for managing users, works with the users collection.
    VotingManager
    Class for managing voting processes ("voting" database collection) and user votes ("votingusers" database collection).
